to measure the impact of marketing efforts by the Corporation; and

Not later than 60 days after the date on which the Corporation receives a report from the

The Corporation shall—
establish a competitive procurement process; and

certify in its annual
			 report to Congress under subsection (c)(3) that any contracts entered into
			 were in compliance with the established competitive procurement process.
